sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通过审讯，最初被抓获的两男子为任某和杨某。

sentences.english: In the beginning the training sessions were held at Volvo Trucks dealerships on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 最初的培训课程由沃尔沃卡车公司安排在周日进行。

sentences.english: The montgolfier brothers began experimenting by filling small paper bags with smoke.
sentences.chinese: 蒙戈尔菲耶兄弟俩最初的实验是把烟装进小纸袋。

sentences.english: It was originally used medicinally by the Egyptians.
sentences.chinese: 它最初被埃及人用于医药方面。

sentences.english: Initial tension melted into transparency and forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 最初的紧张融化为透明和饶恕。

sentences.english: My first interest in snooker occurred when I was seven years old.
sentences.chinese: 我最初对斯诺克产生兴趣是在七岁的时候。

sentences.english: What is the 20-digit serial code for the original game time card used to activate the account?
sentences.chinese: 最初启动游戏帐号的20位数数字代码是什么？

sentences.english: In the beginning, they believed in Tengri Shamanism and were nomadic.
sentences.chinese: 他们最初信奉萨满教，过着游牧生活。

sentences.english: He initially tried to eat more to gain weight, but it had no effect.
sentences.chinese: 最初，他试着吃多吃来增加体重，不过完全无效。

sentences.english: The contract contains options for additional payloads that would add to the initial award value.
sentences.chinese: 合同包含了可能会添加到最初授予价值的额外的载荷。

sentences.english: How did you get into photography in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 你最初是怎么开始摄影的？

sentences.english: Trend traders use an initial risk rule that determines position size at the time of entry.
sentences.chinese: 趋势交易者买进伊始，便设立最初的止盈和止损位置。

sentences.english: Eventually, the original business was eclipsed by the other holdings.
sentences.chinese: 最终，最初的这家公司与其它财产相比黯然失色。

sentences.english: Their first exhibition of themselves was in a processional march of two and two round the parish.
sentences.chinese: 他们最初的表演是排成双行队伍绕着教区游行。

sentences.english: The original characters are Oracle, popular in the Shang period.
sentences.chinese: 最初的汉字是甲骨文，盛行于殷商时期。

sentences.english: The patient was initially treated with ampicillin for a period of 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 患者最初用氨苄西林治疗了10天。

definition: in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
